name: Radiance of Anthakkar
description:
A mystic metroidvania with deep atmosphere and suggestive symbolism that invites to an inward journey.

The starship-temple has fallen into the planet Anthakkar, which our order of the Astral Wardens have been monitoring for years now. The meteors appeared as if from the void, bypassing all our defenses before they could even engage. Their interdimensional edges tore through our hull like leaves in a heavy wind. Somehow, you were able to survive the wreckage and now is up to you, young one, to find out the mysterious machinations of the assault against our ancient order.

Welcome to the development of Radiance of Anthakkar. We are Ramón (art) and Jason (code) and we are hard at work at this project. If you'd like to join the duscussion, send us bug reports, feedback or just have a word with us you can join our discord: https://discord.gg/C7TkvjQPKz

Also you can follow us on twitter

Ramón: @shurita

Jason: @Dev_Fyreflyte
